Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute at Racine/74th
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 74th, Loomis, (Continued across 74th), and Racine due to, street blockage near Racine/74th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 74th, Loomis, (Continued across 74th), and Racine due to, street blockage near Racine/74th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No Trains Between Clinton and Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Clinton and Roosevelt due to signal problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Clinton and Roosevelt due to signal problems.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between Harlem and Clinton, and,
  • between Ashland/63rd and Roosevelt, only.

Shuttle buses are available between between Clinton and Roosevelt  to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Clinton and the Loop
ShortDescription: Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between Clinton and the Loop due to signal problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between Clinton and the Loop due to signal problems.

As a result, trains are operating only between 54th/Cermak and Clinton at this time.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
